title: Two-dimensional h-BAs/MoXTe (X = S, Se) heterojunctions with high photocatalytic performance and high photoelectric conversion efficiency
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00795F, Paper
Yuliang Mao, Zhiwei Zhang
In this paper, the geometric structures and electronic and optical properties of h-BAs/MoXTe (X = S, Se) heterojunctions are systematically investigated based on first-principles calculations.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
